page.title: 09RETAIL TRADE IN STOTTESDON
page.content: Old established{shop}in centre of village. Sells groceries, sweets, tobacco,frozen foods & small household items. Approx 17% of families in block use it regularly for some but not all groceries. Many more use it on a casual basis. Also sells petrol. <Next petrol 3 mls away.> Centre for local information & gossip! {Post office}in front room of a council house. Phone & Post box not at P.O. No sign. Used by at least 2/3 of families in block for stamps, allowances &c. Chimney sweep may be booked from here. Two{Public houses}in village centre. One serves meals & morning coffee. At the other they brew their own beer, & have a darts & dominoes club. {Deliveries}listed on page 8 are mainly concentrated in the village. Services to outlying farms are much more restricted or non-existant.
